landing.faq.q1: Is WiFi Digital compatible with existing WiFi devices?
landing.faq.a1: Yes, WiFi Digital supports most popular WiFi device brands on the market such as TP-Link, Aruba, Ruckus, Unifi, etc. through standard protocols.
landing.faq.a2: We offer a free 30-day trial with full features for you to experience real effectiveness.
landing.faq.a3: We strictly comply with ISO 27001 and GDPR standards. Data is end-to-end encrypted and securely stored at Tier 3 certified Data Centers.
landing.faq.a4: Costs are flexible based on the number of Access Points and feature modules you choose. Contact us for detailed pricing.
landing.solutions.title: Specialized solutions for every business model
landing.solutions.subtitle: We understand that each industry has unique challenges. Our system is designed to precisely solve your specific problems.
landing.solutions.airport.desc: High-speed WiFi, smart routing, location-based advertising & journey tracking.
landing.solutions.hotel.desc: PMS integration, personalized splash pages, bandwidth management by room category.
landing.solutions.retail.desc: Shopping behavior analysis, customer heatmaps, contextual advertising.
landing.solutions.office.desc: Enterprise-grade security, 802.1x authentication, BYOD device management.
landing.solutions.education.desc: Content filtering, time-based access control, stable online exam support.

confirm-delete-order: Are you sure you want to delete this order?
tour-ads-welcome-content: Let's explore the ads management features. This guided tour will help you familiarize yourself with the interface and main functions.
tour-ads-search-content: Use this search box to quickly find ads by template name.
tour-ads-filter-type-content: Select ad type (Video, Banner, Survey, App) to filter the ads list.
tour-ads-filter-site-content: Select a site to view ads for a specific location.
tour-ads-filter-ssid-content: After selecting a site, you can further filter by specific SSID.
tour-ads-filter-status-content: Filter ads by status: Active, Inactive, or Pending Approval.
tour-ads-add-button-content: Click here to create a new ad. You'll need to fill in information such as template name, ad type, site, SSID, and display time range.
tour-ads-card-content: Each card displays a summary of the ad including: media preview, template name, SSID, ad type, site, display time, and status.
tour-ads-actions-content: Use these buttons to: View change history (clock icon), Edit ad (pen icon), or Delete ad (trash icon).
tour-ads-approve-content: For ads in 'Pending Approval' status, you'll see an 'Approve' button to activate the ad.
tour-ads-pagination-content: Use pagination to navigate through ad pages. The number of ads per page automatically adjusts based on screen size.
tour-ad-detail-welcome-content: This is where you can view and edit ad details. Let's explore the features!
tour-ad-detail-actions-content: Use the Switch to enable/disable the ad. The Approve button (if available) activates pending ads. The Delete button removes the ad.
tour-ad-detail-template-name-content: Enter a template name to easily identify your ad.
tour-ad-detail-site-content: Select the site where the ad will be displayed.
tour-ad-detail-ssid-content: Select a specific SSID for the ad. SSID depends on the selected site.
tour-ad-detail-ad-type-content: Choose ad type: Video, Video & Banner, Banner, Survey, Survey OTP, or App. Changing type will auto-save and refresh the form.
tour-ad-detail-time-range-content: Select the time range during the day when the ad will be displayed (e.g., 08:00 - 22:00).
tour-ad-detail-device-selector-content: Use these buttons to preview the ad on different devices: Mobile, Tablet, or Desktop.
tour-ad-detail-form-content: Fill in configuration details for the ad such as URL, images, video, content... depending on the selected ad type.
tour-ad-detail-preview-stepper-content: Click on the screen numbers (Screen 1, 2, 3...) to preview each display step of the ad on user devices.
tour-ad-detail-preview-content: Preview how your ad will appear on actual devices.
tour-ad-detail-save-content: Click Save to update your changes. If the ad is active, it will change to 'Pending Approval' status.
tour-form-upload-video-content: Drag and drop or click to upload video file for the ad. Supports MP4, AVI, MOV formats.
tour-form-upload-logo-content: Upload partner logo to display on the ad. Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP.
tour-form-upload-banner-content: Upload banner image for the ad. Can upload separately for Mobile, Tablet and Desktop.
tour-form-design-content: Customize background color, button color, button text and other design settings for the ad.
tour-form-url-content: Enter destination URL, App Store link, CH Play or other links depending on ad type.
gosafe-hero-desc: Non-violent prisoner tracking solution, helping them reintegrate into the community while authorities maintain 24/7 control.
gosafe-products-subtitle: Comprehensive monitoring solution with advanced hardware devices designed for maximum efficiency.
gosafe-faq-q1: How GPS Ankle Bracelets for Prisoners Work?
gosafe-faq-a1: GPS ankle bracelets for prisoners are electronic monitoring devices that track an individual's location in real-time. These bracelets use GPS technology to communicate with a central monitoring system, providing authorities with the wearer's exact location and movement history. They are typically worn by individuals on parole, probation, or house arrest, allowing law enforcement to ensure compliance with court-ordered restrictions, such as staying within designated areas or avoiding certain locations. If the wearer tries to tamper with or remove the device, it sends an alert to authorities. This technology offers a way to monitor offenders while allowing some degree of freedom.
gosafe-faq-a2: Click here to discover the full range of GPS tracking solutions.
gosafe-faq-q3: Features to Consider When Choosing a Prisoner Tracking Bracelet
gosafe-faq-a3: When choosing a prisoner tracking bracelet, important features to consider include GPS accuracy, battery life, and tamper-resistance. The GPS should offer precise location tracking, even in areas with weak signals, to ensure reliable monitoring. Long battery life is crucial for continuous monitoring without frequent recharges, which could pose a risk of non-compliance. Tamper-resistant design with strong materials and alerts for attempted removal or interference enhances security. Additional features like two-way communication, customizable geofencing zones, and integration with law enforcement systems can also improve functionality, making it easier to manage and track offenders effectively. Read further: Top Features to Consider When Choosing a Prisoner Tracking Bracelet
gosafe-product-beacon-desc: Device supporting indoor positioning, helping Electronic monitor more accurately when the offender is in areas without GPS.
gosafe-product-powerbank-desc: High-performance power bank, extending the operating time of Electronic monitoring device in harsh environments.
gosafe-footer-desc: Comprehensive offender monitoring and management solution. Advanced technology, high security, and community reintegration support.
gosafe-contact-desc: Leave your information, and VTC Telecom's expert team will contact you to answer any questions.
gosafe-contact-info-address-value: 614 (Level 3) Dien Bien Phu, Vuon Lai Ward, Ho Chi Minh City
gosafe-product-g737-detail-1-content: Sends alerts when entering restricted areas or violating rules.
gosafe-product-g737-detail-2-content: Any attempt to cut the strap is detected and alerts are sent instantly.
gosafe-product-g737-detail-3-content: Allows offenders to reintegrate into the community while ensuring security.
gosafe-product-g737-detail-4-content: Helps authorities make quick decisions thanks to real-time monitoring data.
gosafe-product-beacon-detail-1-content: Works seamlessly with Electronic, extending indoor monitoring range.
gosafe-product-beacon-detail-3-content: Instantly notifies Electronic when the beacon is removed or tampered with.
gosafe-product-beacon-detail-4-content: Battery lasts up to 4 years, requiring minimal maintenance.
gosafe-product-powerbank-detail-1-conten: Large capacity, supports 1 or 2 optional lithium batteries.
gosafe-product-powerbank-detail-3-conten: IP67 dust & water resistant, stable outdoor operation.
gosafe-product-powerbank-detail-4-conten: Short circuit, overcurrent, overvoltage protection for maximum safety.
gosafe-solutions-subtitle: System for management, supervision of bailees and community reintegration support
gosafe-solutions-admin-1-desc: Real-time GPS tracking, route display, device status (fiber optic, battery, IBeacon).
gosafe-solutions-admin-2-desc: Alerts for strap cut, low battery, geofence violation, signal loss via web, app, email, SMS.
gosafe-solutions-admin-3-desc: Set permitted/prohibited zones (circle, polygon, route) and time-based geofences.
gosafe-solutions-admin-4-desc: Manage personal info, photos, ID, device assignment, and violation history.
gosafe-solutions-admin-5-desc: Route playback, speed reports, stops, and PDF/Excel export.
gosafe-solutions-admin-6-desc: Overview of status, alert reports, and analytics.
gosafe-solutions-app-desc: App for monitored individuals to comply with obligations, reporting, and check-in.
gosafe-solutions-app-2-desc: Location recording, alerts for geofence violations.
gosafe-solutions-app-3-desc: Appointments, periodic reports, and duty reminders.
gosafe-solutions-app-5-desc: View check-in history, violations, and reminders.
gosafe-solutions-app-6-desc: Social services info, employment, counseling, and psychological support.
gosafe-solution-group-1-desc: Real-time visibility into offender location and movement history with high precision.
gosafe-solution-group-2-desc: Proactive alert system with flexible geofence configuration to ensure community safety.
gosafe-solution-group-3-desc: Ensure the right person is at the right place with multi-factor authentication and scheduled check-ins.
gosafe-solution-group-4-desc: Centralized dashboard for profiles, devices, and deep insights into offender behavior.
gosafe-solution-group-5-desc: The mobile application is dedicated to the offender, facilitating compliance and communication. It enables biometric check-ins, secure messaging with authorities, and access to rehabilitation resources. This tool ensures offenders remain connected and adherent to their supervision conditions.
